title: Really? The same terrible Game Mode AGAIN?
body: Why Riot? C'mon. This has to be the worst game mode you've ever released... Why force it down our throats because you wasted so much time designing it? So disappointing when there are such good game modes on offer like URF and Ascension, Dominion and Hexakill. Hell, any of them. Just not this poorly designed, un-enjoyable crap :(
